solution_line_template: From Monday to Friday, Elle practices {daily_practice_hours} x {weekday_count} = <<{daily_practice_hours}*{weekday_count}={weekday_total_practice_hours}>>{weekday_total_practice_hours} hours.
On Saturday, she practices {daily_practice_hours} x {saturday_multiplier} = <<{daily_practice_hours}*{saturday_multiplier}={saturday_practice_hours}>>{saturday_practice_hours} hours.

Each week, Elle practices piano for {weekday_total_practice_hours} + {saturday_practice_hours} = <<{weekday_total_practice_hours}+{saturday_practice_hours}={weekly_total_practice_hours}>>{weekly_total_practice_hours} hours.
